name: WordPress Annoyances
description: WordPress allows bloggers to set floating annoyances such as a follow box that normally is a merely annoying tab at the bottom, but on tablets sometimes floats in front of the content. That plus some other annoyances will be addressed here as I run into them. AdBlock probably gets other things, I wouldn't know.
additional_info:
1. #bit  Floating follow box that normally is a merely annoying tab at the bottom, but on tablets sometimes floats in front of the content (set per site so you may not have seen it before).
2. #infinite-footer  Floating centered box always there and disruptively refreshing merely to tell me which theme is in use?  NO THANKS.
3. ...more someday I'm sure...
